Node.name: Java
Node.description: Java is a programming language originally developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems and released in 1995 as a core component of Sun Microsystems' Java platform.

Node.name: Ruby
Node.description: Ruby is a dynamic, reflective, general purpose object-oriented programming language that combines syntax inspired by Perl with Smalltalk-like features.

Node.name: Python
Node.description: Python is a general-purpose high-level programming language.

Node.name: C++
Node.description: C++ (pronounced "See plus plus") is a statically typed, free-form, multi-paradigm, compiled, general-purpose programming language.
